description: MEASURES ITS_LIVE Regional Glacier and Ice Sheet Surface Velocities, Version 2. This dataset provides mean annual surface velocities (1984-2022) and climatological mean velocities (2014-2022) for 16 RGI glacier-covered regions on 120 m resolution grids. Velocities are derived by applying the autoRIFT processing chain to imagery from Sentinel-1, Sentinel-2, and Landsat 4, 5, 7, 8, and 9 satellites.
title: MEASURES ITS_LIVE Regional Glacier and Ice Sheet Surface Velocities, Version 2

providers.name: NASA National Snow and Ice Data Center Distributed Active Archive Center (NSIDC DAAC)

eo:bands.name: v
eo:bands.description: Mean annual or climatological velocity magnitude (m/yr)

eo:bands.name: vx
eo:bands.description: Mean annual or climatological velocity component in x direction (m/yr)

eo:bands.name: vy
eo:bands.description: Mean annual or climatological velocity component in y direction (m/yr)

eo:bands.name: count
eo:bands.description: Number of image pairs used in error weighted least squares fit

eo:bands.name: dvx_dt
eo:bands.description: Trend in vx (m/y²). Available in climatological files only.

eo:bands.name: dvy_dt
eo:bands.description: Trend in vy (m/y²). Available in climatological files only.

eo:bands.name: v_amp
eo:bands.description: Climatological mean seasonal amplitude in the direction of mean flow (m/yr). Available in climatological files only.
